title: Sanctified and Saved Swingers
itunes:title: Sanctified and Saved Swingers
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’m a black man in my mid-thirties and I’m married to the woman of my dreams. We moved back to my home state a few years back and we joined a great new church. We are friends with several of the young married couples there, but we’re having a problem with one couple in particular. We used to hang out with them and we got really close and would double date with this couple and have game night at their house or ours...............

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’m a black man in my mid-thirties and I’m married to the woman of my dreams. We moved back to my home state a few years back and we joined a great new church. We are friends with several of the young married couples there, but we’re having a problem with one couple in particular. We used to hang out with them and we got really close and would double date with this couple and have game night at their house or ours...............

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
